Items.Command: az | PowerShell uses a verb-noun pair for the names of cmdlets
Items.Details:
Syntax


Example Usage:

Log in to Azure


Example Usage:

  • az login -u johndoe@contoso.com -p VerySecret
  • Connect-AzAccount

Manage Azure subscription information


Example Usage:

  • az account list --o table
  • Get-AzSubscription

Manage private registries with Azure Container Registries


Example Usage:

  • az acr list -g MyResourceGroup -o table
  • Get-AzContainerRegistry -ResourceGroupName 'MyResourceGroup'

Manage Azure Container Services


Example Usage:

  • az acs list-locations --subscription
  • Get-AzContainerService -ResourceGroupName 'myRG'

Manage Azure Active Directory


Example Usage:

  • az ad group show --group
  • Get-AzADGroup -First 100

Manage Azure Advisor


Example Usage:

  • az advisor recommendation list --category Performance
  • Get-AzAdvisorRecommendation -Category Performance

Manage Azure Kubernetes Services


Example Usage:

  • az aks get-versions --location westus2
  • Get-AzAksVersion -Location westus

Manage Azure Media Services resources


Example Usage:

  • az ams account list --resource-group --subscription
  • Get-AzMediaService -ResourceGroupName 'myRG'

Manage App Configurations


Example Usage:

  • az appconfig list -g MyResourceGroup
  • Get-AzAppConfigurationStore

Manage App Service plans


Example Usage:

  • az appservice ase list
  • Get-AzAppServicePlan -Location 'West US'

Manage Azure Backups


Example Usage:

  • az backup container show..
  • Get-AzRecoveryServicesBackupJob

Manage Azure Batch


Example Usage:

  • az batch account list [--resource-group] [--subscription]
  • Get-AzBatchAccount -AccountName 'pfuller'

Manage Azure Billing


Example Usage:

  • az billing period show --name --subscription
  • Get-AzBillingInvoice -Latest

Manage Azure Content Delivery Networks


Example Usage:

  • az cdn origin list
  • Get-AzCdnOrigin

Manage Azure Cognitive Services accounts


Example Usage:

  • az cognitiveservices account list -g MyResourceGroup
  • Get-AzCognitiveServicesAccount

Manage Azure CLI configuration


Example Usage:

  • az configure --defaults group=myRG web=myweb vm=myvm
  • Set-AzContext -SubscriptionId 'xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx'

Manage Azure Container Instances.


Example Usage:

  • az container logs --name MyContainerGroup --resource-group MyResourceGroup
  • Get-AzContainerGroup -ResourceGroupName demo -Name mycontainer

Manage Azure Cosmos DB database


Example Usage:

  • az cosmosdb list [--resource-group] [--subscription]
  • Get-AzCosmosDBAccount -ResourceGroupName {resourceGroupName} -Name {databaseAccountName}

Manage ARM template deployment at subscription scope


Example Usage:

  • az deployment group list -g testrg
  • Get-AzDeploymentManagerArtifactSource -InputObject $artifactSourceObject

Manage Azure Managed Disks


Example Usage:

  • az disk list [--resource-group] [--subscription]
  • Get-AzDisk -ResourceGroupName 'ResourceGroup01' -DiskName 'Disk01'

Manage Data Lake Analytics


Example Usage:

  • az dla account list [--resource-group] [--subscription]
  • Get-AzDataLakeAnalyticsAccount -Name 'ContosoAdlAccount'

Manage Data Lake Store


Example Usage:

  • az dls account list --resource-group myRG
  • Get-AzDataLakeStoreAccount -Name 'ContosoADL'

Manage Azure Data Migration Service


Example Usage:

  • az dms check-name --location westus2 --name MyService
  • Get-AzDataMigrationProject -InputObject $myService

Manage Azure Event Grid


Example Usage:

  • Get-AzEventGridDomain -ResourceGroup myRG -Name Domain1
  • az ams account list --resource-group --subscription

Manage Azure Event Hubs


Example Usage:

  • az eventhubs eventhub list --resource-group myRG --namespace-name mynamespace
  • Get-AzEventHub -ResourceGroup myRG -NamespaceName MyNamespaceName

Manage resource provider features


Example Usage:

  • az feature list
  • Register-AzResourceProvider -ProviderNamespace Microsoft.Network

Find commands


Example Usage:

  • az find 'az storage'
  • Get-Command -Verb Get -Noun AzVM* -Module Az.Compute

Manage function apps


Example Usage:

  • az functionapp list --query '[?state=='Running']'
  • Get-AzFunctionApp

Manage resource groups and template deployments


Example Usage:

  • az group create -l westus -n myRG
  • Get-AzResourceGroup -Name 'EngineerBlog'

Manage HDInsight resources.


Example Usage:

  • az hdinsight list [--resource-group] [--subscription]
  • Get-AzHDInsightCluster

Managed Service Identities.


Example Usage:

  • az identity list-operations [--subscription]
  • Get-AzUserAssignedIdentity -ResourceGroupName PSRG -Name ID1

Manage custom virtual machine images.


Example Usage:

  • az image builder show --name mytemplate --resource-group my-group
  • Get-AzImageBuilderTemplate

Manage KeyVault


Example Usage:

  • az keyvault list [--resource-group] [--subscription]
  • Get-AzKeyVault

Manage Azure Kusto resources


Example Usage:

  • az kusto cluster list --resource-group myRG
  • Get-AzKustoCluster -ResourceGroupName testrg

Manage Azure locks


Example Usage:

  • az lock list
  • Get-AzResourceLock -ResourceGroupName 'myRG' -AtScope

Manage assignments and definitions


Example Usage:

  • az managedservices definition list
  • Get-AzManagedServicesAssignment

Manage Azure Maps


Example Usage:

  • az maps account show --name MyMapsAccount --resource-group myRG
  • Get-AzMapsAccount -ResourceGroupName myRG

Manage Azure Database for MariaDB servers


Example Usage:

  • az mariadb db list -g testgroup -s testsvr
  • Get-AzMariaDbServer

Manage the Azure Monitor Service.


Example Usage:

  • az monitor action-group list [--resource-group] [--subscription]
  • Get-AzActionGroup

Manage Azure Database for MySQL servers.


Example Usage:

  • az mysql db list -g testgroup -s testsvr
  • Get-AzMySqlServer

Manage Azure Network resources.


Example Usage:

  • az network nic list --query '[?dnsSettings.internalDomainNameSuffix=`{dnsSuffix}`]'
  • Get-AzNetworkInterface

Manage resource policies.


Example Usage:

  • az policy definition show --name MyPolicyDefinition
  • Get-AzPolicyDefinition

Manage Azure Database for PostgreSQL servers.


Example Usage:

  • az postgres db list -g testgroup -s testsvr
  • Get-AzPostgreSqlServer

Manage dedicated Redis caches for your Azure applications.


Example Usage:

  • az redis list [--resource-group] [--subscription]
  • Get-AzRedisCache -Name 'myexists'

Manage Azure Reservations


Example Usage:

  • az reservations reservation list --reservation-order-id [--subscription]
  • Get-AzReservation -ReservationOrderId '1111aaaa'

Manage Azure resources.


Example Usage:

  • az resource list --location westus
  • Get-AzResource | ft

Manage user roles for access control with AAD and service principals


Example Usage:

  • az role assignment list [--all]
  • Get-AzADServicePrincipal

Manage Azure Search services


Example Usage:

  • az search service list --resource-group [--subscription]
  • Get-AzSearchService -ResourceGroupName felixwa-01

Manage security with Azure Security Center


Example Usage:

  • az security alert list
  • Get-AzDiscoveredSecuritySolution

Manage shared image gallery


Example Usage:

  • az sig list [--resource-group] [--subscription]
  • Get-AzImageBuilderTemplate

Manage snapshots


Example Usage:

  • az snapshot list [--resource-group] [--subscription]
  • Get-AzSnapshot

Manage Azure SQL Databases and Data Warehouses.


Example Usage:

  • az sql db list --resource-group myRG --server myserver
  • Get-AzSqlDatabase -ResourceGroupName 'myRG' -ServerName 'server01'

Manage Azure Storage resources


Example Usage:

  • az storage account list -g myRG]
  • Get-AzStorageAccount -ResourceGroupName 'RG01'

Manage resource tags


Example Usage:

  • az tag list [--subscription]
  • Get-AzTag -Name 'Department'

Show the versions of Azure CLI modules


Example Usage:

  • az version [--subscription]
  • Get-InstalledModule Azure -AllVersions

Manage Linux or Windows virtual machines


Example Usage:

  • az vm list -g myRG
  • Get-AzVM -ResourceGroupName 'myRG' -Name 'VirtualMachine07'

Manage Virtual Machine Scale Set (VMSS)


Example Usage:

  • az vmss list --resource-group myRG
  • Get-AzVmss -ResourceGroupName 'Group001' -VMScaleSetName 'VMSS001'

Manage web apps


Example Usage:

  • az webapp list --query '[?state=='Running']'
  • Get-AzWebApp -myRG 'Default-Web-WestUS' -Name 'ContosoSite'
